channel.title: Switch-Between on DavidCraddock.net
channel.description: Recent content in Switch-Between on DavidCraddock.net

item.title: Switching Audio between two Soundcards
item.description: If you have two soundcards - maybe a normal soundcard for your speakers and maybe a headset with its own audio interface - you will want some way of switching all audio between the two. This is an great little open-source tool to do just that. It works on Mac, and Windows 7 up to 10: https://soundswitch.codeplex.com/
item.content:encoded:
If you have two soundcards - maybe a normal soundcard for your speakers and maybe a headset with its own audio interface - you will want some way of switching all audio between the two. This is an great little open-source tool to do just that. It works on Mac, and Windows 7 up to 10:

https://soundswitch.codeplex.com/
